definition: constellation/astrological sign/CL:張|张[zhang1]
star/heavenly body/satellite/small amount
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects
Andromeda constellation (galaxy) M31
the twelve constellations on the ecliptic plane/the signs of the zodiac
Lyra, constellation containing Vega 織女星|织女星[Zhi1 nu:3 xing1]
(Western-style) horoscope

sentences.english: The area that Miaka pointed to was the region where the constellations of Cancer and Gemini shone.
sentences.chinese: 美朱指着的那片天空正是雙子星座和巨蟹星座。

sentences.english: He usually spends about two and a half years in each zodiac sign.
sentences.chinese: 他通常花近兩方面，每個星座半。

sentences.english: Nobody carries a grudge better than this sign.
sentences.chinese: 沒有哪個星座比蠍子更容易產生怨恨情緒了。

sentences.english: First things first, use whole sign houses.
Chinese astrology and constellations were often used for divination.
sentences.chinese: 中國星象學及星座常用於占卜。

sentences.english: The constellation Vulpecula is a veritable entire assembly line of newborn stars.
sentences.chinese: 整個狐狸星座是一條真正新生恆星的組裝線。

sentences.english: The Ecraft workh element of Taurus can leadvertisement to strength mainly because well mainly because desire for solid ground form and structure.
sentences.chinese: 土相星座的特質讓金牛座祈望並具有腳踏實地的能力。

sentences.english: Epsilon lies at the western edge of the constellation .
sentences.chinese: 星位於這個星座的西邊緣。

sentences.english: An asterism is a star formation that is not an officially recognized constellation.
sentences.chinese: 這個三星符號是沒有被官方確認的星座。

sentences.english: The cluster lies 2600 light-years from Earth in the constellation of Monoceros.
sentences.chinese: 這棵“樹”實際是距離地球2600光年的麒麟星座。

sentences.english: The Earth element of Taurus brings strength and the desire for solid ground form. and structure.
sentences.chinese: 土相星座的特質讓金牛座渴望並具有腳踏實地的能力。

sentences.english: The standard 3-letter abbreviation for the constellation.
sentences.chinese: 每個星座三個字母的標準縮寫。

sentences.english: Libra is an air sign, like Gemini and Aquarius.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座和雙子，水瓶一樣，是一個風象星座。

sentences.english: Saturn, which can act as a handbrake at times, is now moving forward in your sign.
sentences.chinese: 土星有時就像手剎一樣，現在正在你的星座前行。

sentences.english: It is no exaggeration to say many people are obsessed with horoscopes.
sentences.chinese: 如果說有一大堆人對星座著迷，可是一點也不誇張。
